overview: This work, originally shot on Super-8 was made as part of a Women and Art course at Sydney College of the Arts. Students who worked on the little experiment were: Sue Callanan, Ingrid Cullen, Ruby Davies, Sue Doust, Anne Ferran, Beth Gibbins, Pam Ledden, Kate Millington, Jenny Oâ€™Brien, Jane Parkes, Jenny Pitty, John Simpson, with extras, Eliza Campbell and Judith Lodwick.
title: If Looks Could Kill
